thread.title: BRIEF-Airboss Announces Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.16

title: BRIEF-Airboss Announces Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.16
text: March 14, 2018 / 9:14 PM / Updated 5 minutes ago BRIEF-Airboss Announces Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.16 Reuters Staff March 14 (Reuters) - Airboss Of America Corp: * AIRBOSS ANNOUNCES 4TH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS AND DIVIDEND * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.16 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.10 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * QTRLY NET SALES $74.2 MILLION VERSUS $63 MLN‍​ * AIRBOSS OF AMERICA - IN RUBBER SOLUTIONS SEGMENT, CHALLENGES FACED IN 2017 WITH INCREASED RAW MATERIAL COSTS EXPECTED TO CONTINUE IN 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
